titleStmt.title: Britanniæ speculum, or, A short view of the ancient and modern state of Great Britain, and the adjacent isles, and of all other the dominions and territories, now in the actual possession of His present Sacred Majesty King Charles II the first part, treating of Britain in general.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Milbourn for Christopher Hussey ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
